page.title: 10Marton Museum
page.content: Marton Museum contains a lot of country tools and items from the Victorian and Edwardian times. It is a privately owned museum which has been opened to the public for 20 years Everything within its walls has been collected from a ten mile radius. Inside,one is conducted through different sections.They cover law en- forcement,household equipment and lace and hat making.There are examples of Edwardian costume. In the agricultural section we saw many pieces of farm machinery eg.ploughs and animal traps.We saw the cruel teeth and learned that catching poachers with man traps only became illegal in the 19th century.In the dairy was an interesting collection to do with butter making. The museum is of immense interest to anyone concerned with our heritage.
